choices.C: the etherchannel protocol on switch 1 is not correct
choices.D: the etherchannel interface of switch 2 is not configured
choices.B: the etherchannel interface of switch 1 is not configured
choices.A: the etherchannel on the switch 1 using incorrect member port

questions.question_text: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer is configuring an etherchannel between two switches, he notices the error message on Switch 2 (error message channel- misconfiguring error), based on the output what is the problem?

discussion.content:
The correct answer is B - Port Fast.

Source: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/lan/cisco_ie4010/software/release/15-2_4_EC/configuration/guide/scg-ie4010_5000/swvoip.pdf - on page 3.
Port fast is enable immediately after you configure the vlan voice over an interface.

questions.question_text: Which feature is automatically configured when an administrator enables a voice VLAN?
What is the Ethernet frame size for 802.1Q?

discussion.content: Question needs to be added word -minimum- or -maximum- or both. minimum 68 maximum 1522

comments.content:
What do you mean?
For non jumbo-frames: 
Ethernet frame: 18 byte (header) + 4 byte (802.1q tag) + 1500 (maximum payload) = 1522 byte

discussion.content: what is the maximum size for ... ???

questions.question_text:
If HSRP group number is 45 what would be the MAC address?
(Basically conversion of digit to hexadecimal with group of 16.)

discussion.content:
Step 1: Divide (45)successively by 16 until the quotient is 0:

45/16 = 2, remainder is 13

2/16 = 0, remainder is 2

Step 2: Read from the bottom (MSB) to top (LSB) as 2D. This is the hexadecimal equivalent of decimal number 45 (Answer).

questions.question_text: What types of SDM templates you can use in switch? (Choose all that apply.)
questions.answer_description:
✑ Access - The access template maximizes system resources for access control lists (ACLs) to accommodate a large number of ACLs.
✑ Default - The default template gives balance to all functions.
✑ Routing - The routing template maximizes system resources for IPv4 unicast routing, typically required for a router or aggregator in the center of a network.
✑ VLANs - The VLAN template disables routing and supports the maximum number of unicast MAC addresses. It would typically be selected for a Layer 2 switch.

discussion.content: is missing the phrase.. choose all that apply..
